extendedInfo.description: Textfree is the USAâs #1 free texting app!FREE UNLIMITED TEXT (SMS) AND PICTURE MESSAGING (MMS)!We make text and picture messaging free. Free this year, next year--free any year, for all your SMS messages to over 35 countries.  Your friends donât need Textfree to receive--they donât even need to have a smartphone.  No carrier contract or texting plan required.  Text free with Textfree!NO HIDDEN COSTS--EVERSome âfreeâ apps charge you after a while. Not us. Nope, never.WANT CALLING?  TRY PINGER!â¢ Same texting features, now with callingâ¢ Even faster, more powerful than Textfreeâ¢ Download the new app called Pinger, itâs FREE!BETTER THAN THOSE MESSENGER APPSWith Textfree you get your own real phone number that you can use to SMS any number, even if they donât have Textfree and even if they donât have a smartphone!  Send real SMS to over 35 countries, free!GREAT WHEN YOUâRE TRAVELING ABROADDownload Textfree and send free texts from anywhere in the world as long as you have a data connection. Find free WiFi at your hotel, a restaurant, even on a train.  Why pay for expensive roaming charges when you can SMS free!TEXT TO OVER 35 COUNTRIESFor a list of countries you can text to, visit: http://pinger.zendesk.com/entries/21778606-international-texting .OUTSIDE THE US?For download instructions, visit: http://pinger.zendesk.com/entries/22202356-download-textfree-android-outside-the-us .PACKED WITH ADDITIONAL FEATURES â¢ Get a free second line for your phoneâ¢ Send unlimited free SMS to more than 35 countriesâ¢ Facebook Chat keeps you in touch with friends who donât textâ¢ Send text via your regular number or send free text with your Pinger number.â¢ Get notifications when you receive a text while outside of the app. â¢ Your free texts are stored in the cloud when offline and delivered to you when you are back. Never miss a text!OTHER IMPORTANT INFO â¢ Your friends not on Textfree pay regular charges for texts and pics--nothing extraâ¢ Pic msgs work with AT&T, Boost, Nextel, Sprint, T-mobile, Verizon and Virginâ¢ Picture messages come from your @textfree.us username--have your friends send pics to that address â¢ Textfree is ad-supported, so you will see ads from time to timeâ¢ Tablet support coming soon â¢ Requires OS 2.1+â¢ Read our terms of service:http://www.pinger.com/content/textfree/eula/android.htmlTEXT FROM THE WEBâ¢ pinger.com/tfwCONNECT WITH US â¢ facebook.com/pingerâ¢ twitter.com/pinger

reviews.title: I love text free! Best out of them all
reviews.comment: I had to link my pinger to a real phone or I couldn\'t continue using my account, and now my phone I linked it to doesn\'t get or send texts to any pinger number. Why!!!?!? But still the best app around
reviews.author: John Doe

reviews.title: good but...
reviews.comment: at first it was working great,i goto work with my phone and i dnt get txts there(hence why i ise txtfree)but when i get home and it picks up my wifi i get my txts from the day,but recently i cant recieve or sent txts for months at a time,idk whats wrong! plz fix!
reviews.author: Yoko Blaska

reviews.title: Thumbs up
reviews.comment: I have a limited# of text and data every month and i think this app is great just wish there were more options when you checked a specific message. Details would be nice.
reviews.author: Kevin Dietz

reviews.title: Was good until....
reviews.comment: Was good until I now have to constantly refresh the page in order to receive text messages. I LOVE Pinger! This app is amazing, but I\'ll be uninstalling until the bug is fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: JUST LIKE THE ORIGINAL TEXT MSG
reviews.comment: I have been using this app for a while now, and it is awesome.  It would be nice to have the option to change the background color and stuff.
reviews.author: C Yek

reviews.title: What would be nice :/
reviews.comment: Is that when i receive at text that i dont have to refresh it to see it and that the pinger talking app would let me use it and not stay stuck on what country im in,other than that its a pretty good app.
reviews.author: Desmin Martinez

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Started great but then it stops working and then its a white page. I then have to uninstall then reinstall the app just do it again in 20 minutes. Please help
reviews.author: Tiffany Frisbey

reviews.title: AWESOME BITCHES (:
reviews.comment: i love you pinger, amazing app. The best so far ^.\342\231\245
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: I downgraded my rating on this app because of the spam texts the company sends. Fix this spammy mess!
reviews.author: Frank Frost

reviews.title: Works sometimes
reviews.comment: Sometimes texts go through okay and other times it literally takes hours for them to get pushed through. But all the ads seem to make their way to my phone.  Not reliable and ads are annoying.
reviews.author: Ken Kienzle

reviews.title: Copy & paste......
reviews.comment: I\'m using galaxy S II... the app is OK but it sucks the fact that u cannot copy form a ward u typed or even paste something... it is very annoying..  plz do something about it! Thank u!
reviews.author: Tareque Inan

reviews.title: This app was awesome
reviews.comment: This app is the best Txting app yet. It let\'s you txt friends and family even without them having the app. Really let me keep in touch with my girl while my phone was off. 5 Star
reviews.author: Jhabreece Mack

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This just goes to show the power of the free market. People finding a way to text for free without a plan, and then they put this app out for everyone to use.  Great work!
reviews.author: Matt H

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It\'s really amazing but I haven\'t been able to receive any picture messages lately, I got them before but now I don\'t. The app is very useful and helpful otherwise.
reviews.author: Hannah Shaw

reviews.title: Really?!?!
reviews.comment: This app (since it\'s update) has been the most annoying app ive ever dealt with. It will only let me send ONE picture when i could send multiple ones in a few seconds. Texts dont always send, or i have to refresh to receive them. It\'ll randomly stop in the middle of texts. Im so close to un-installing! Please update very soon or you\'ll lose a customer!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Neat app.
reviews.comment: Neat app, works great. If you could choose your own ringtone, or customize the conversation colors, i wouldnt be uninstalling. But if that doesnt bother you it is a great app.
reviews.author: Adam Cross

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Please believe I use this app daily.! Not everyone is meant to have my number lol. Love this app!
reviews.author: Jahna Williams

reviews.title: awesome app
reviews.comment: I work overseas and this app let\'s me text back home for free and works awesome..you guys nailed it with this one. It\'s nice to text my family when Im offshore working..... :-)
reviews.author: Jason Watts

reviews.title: Re: registered number
reviews.comment: There needs to be a way to take of a registered number .. I\'ve emailed. Pinger so many times and I haven\'t gotten any help .. please do something about it
reviews.author: Kishma Lawrence

reviews.title: Straight Talk LG Optimus
reviews.comment: I had heard so many good things about it, but I finally downloaded it. The first couple texts went out fine and I was excited... now its just force closing when its open for about 10 seconds. Going to try the other one by Pinger and see. It may just be an update bug. Please fix :)
reviews.author: Chassie Chapmond
